SEARCH
Package util

Class ValidationUtil

java.lang.Object
util.ValidationUtil
public class ValidationUtil extends Object
Utility class for validation and ID generation in the Internship Placement Management System.

This class provides methods for:

  • Generating unique IDs for various entities
  • Validating user IDs, passwords, and email addresses
  • Parsing and formatting dates
  • Validating business rules and constraints

ID Generation:

  • Student IDs: U followed by 7 digits and a letter (e.g., U2345123F)
  • Opportunity IDs: INTERN- followed by timestamp and random digits
  • Application IDs: APP- followed by UUID
  • Request IDs: REQ- followed by UUID
Since:
2025-10-14
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
SC2002 Group 6

  • Method Details

    • generateStudentId

      public static String generateStudentId()
      Generates a unique student ID in the format: U followed by 7 digits and a letter. Example: U2345123F
      Returns:
      a newly generated student ID

    • generateOpportunityId

      public static String generateOpportunityId()
      Generates a unique opportunity ID for internships. Format: INTERN-{timestamp}-{counter}
      Returns:
      a newly generated opportunity ID

    • generateApplicationId

      public static String generateApplicationId()
      Generates a unique application ID. Format: APP-{UUID}
      Returns:
      a newly generated application ID

      Returns:
      a newly generated session ID

      public static boolean isValidStudentId(String studentId)

      Parameters:
      studentId - the student ID to validate
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

      Returns:
      true if strong password, false otherwise
